1.A farmer should own minimum 8 acres of irrigated land 
2.Combine harvester should be utilized for a minimum of 1000 hours of productive work in a year 
3.Minimum 25 percent margin on unit cost may be stipulated 
4.Unit cost will include cost of combine harvester and accessories, if any 
5.Non-farmer entrepreneurs capable of utilizing combine harvester for custom hiring work are also eligible. 
6.Loan will be available only for purchase of new combine harvesters 
7.Repayment of loan will be in five years
